module.name: risk
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of risk.
The risk module identifies a risk and its associated components including the probability of risk, its consequence and impacts, and also the risk reduction and risk treatment methods that may be used to mitigate the risk.

inscope.li: contingency or risk reduction plan identification, approval, and justification;
approach strategy or risk treatment identification and approval;
risk perception identification and relationships between perceived risks.

outscope.li: the process to identify source of risk;
the process used to estimate values for probability and to determine consequences of risk;
the process used to determine classification of risk;
risk evaluation or the process of comparing the estimated risk against given risk criteria to determine the significance of risk, which may be used to assist in the acceptance or treatment decision;
risk communication or the exchange or sharing of information about risk between the decision-maker and other stakeholders.
risk control or the actions implementing risk management decisions;
the development of a risk management system;
risk financing or the provision of funds to meet the cost of implementing risk treatment and related costs.

uof.name: Risk
uof.description: The Risk UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of risk and its associated components including the probability of risk, its consequence and impacts, and also the risk reduction and risk treatment methods that may be used to mitigate the risk.

aa.refpath: action_method_assignment action_method_assignment => risk_criteria_assignment action_method_assignment.role -> action_method_role action_method_role {action_method_role.name = 'risk criteria assignment'}
action action => risk_evaluation risk_evaluation risk_evaluation.risk_perception -> risk_perception
action action => risk_evaluation risk_evaluation risk_evaluation.risk_criteria -> risk_criteria
action_method action_method => risk_perception risk_perception risk_perception.risk_probability -> risk_probability_assignment
action_method action_method => risk_perception risk_perception risk_perception.risk -> risk

classification_assignment classification_assignment => applied_risk_classification_assignment applied_risk_classification_assignment.items -> risk_classification_item risk_classification_item = risk_probability_assignment

classification_assignment classification_assignment => applied_risk_classification_assignment applied_risk_classification_assignment.items -> risk_classification_item risk_classification_item = risk_impact_assignment
classification_assignment classification_assignment => applied_risk_classification_assignment applied_risk_classification_assignment.items -> risk_classification_item risk_classification_item = risk

classification_assignment classification_assignment => applied_risk_classification_assignment applied_risk_classification_assignment.items -> risk_classification_item risk_classification_item = risk_consequence

classification_assignment classification_assignment => applied_risk_classification_assignment applied_risk_classification_assignment.items -> risk_classification_item risk_classification_item = risk_perception

classification_assignment classification_assignment => applied_risk_classification_assignment applied_risk_classification_assignment.items -> risk_classification_item risk_classification_item = risk_perception_relationship

classification_assignment classification_assignment => applied_risk_classification_assignment applied_risk_classification_assignment.items -> risk_classification_item risk_classification_item = risk_relationship
property_definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_object => risk_characterized_object risk_characterized_object <= risk

property_definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_object characterized_object => risk_relationship_characterized_object risk_relationship_characterized_object <= risk_relationship
